Package stocktrader

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Iterator
    This was taken from the Iterator2 demonstration from class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DisplayPanel
    Subclass of JPanel that holds an additional UserSystem attribute.
    LoginPanel
    UNUSED Display Panel for logging into the system.
    MainView
    Frame for Stock Trader that displays all of the Model data and provides control access to it.
    Order
    The Order class is meant used by the portfolio class to add and remove values and prices associated with creating a new order such as min price, max price, and quantity to purchase.
    OwnedStock
    A subclass of StockList that has quantities associated with each stock.
    PaperTrader
    This is a test driver for the classes put together by Nate McCain and other credited sources.
    Portfolio
    Portfolio data structure that holds the stock quotes and pending orders of a User.
    PortfolioPanel
    Displays the Portfolio for the current user.
    StockList
    A class that holds an ArrayList of stock quotes.
    StockList.StepThrough
    This private class implements the iterator design pattern for the StockList.
    StockQuote
    A class that holds all information given in a stock quote.
    TradeCenterPanel
    View and control the Trade Center data and functionality.
    User
    The User class' main purpose is to stores data the can be accessed through the UserSystem class or the Portfolio class.
    UserPanel
    UNUSED Display panel for managing users.
    UserSystem
    The UserSystem class mainly deals with data coming in from the GUI in regards to user management.
    yahooConnectForStockInfo
    This class contains the methods for gathering information about a stock.
